results.content: I would have never thought that building a blog and making decent income from it can be so easy! The course is structured very well and it is easy to follow. The instructor is very knowledgable and it was actually fun to listen & learn. Thank you for this piece of information, I never thought I could make a living online!

results.content: I enjoyed the training very much, thank you very much for it. The content was very comprehensive and information, totally met my expectations. The instructions were interesting and engaging. This course helped me to build my first blog that already generated a some profit for me! Thank you Sandor & Joe!!!!

results.content: There is some ok content in this course if you are just starting a blog. Unfortunately the way it is presented is not great and slightly confusing. The presenter also speaks very slowly although I overcame this by running the video at 1.5 times normal speed.
results.content_html: There is some ok content in this course if you are just starting a blog. Unfortunately the way it is presented is not great and slightly confusing. The presenter also speaks very slowly although I overcame this by running the video at 1.5 times normal speed.

results.content: It´s very boring. The instructor have many gaps when speaking. In some parts of the videos it´s notorius the cut of one sequence and the start of another one, I mean, in one lecture he´s speaking about something and suddenly cuts and starts speaking about other thing.  Very pretentious titles of the lectures but when one check the videos they lack of real interest. In lecture 15 the title says: "Formatting beautiful blog posts" but actually speaks about incentive pages. One very bad thing: It´s not allowed to put new discussions in every lecture so nobody can make complaints or ask something. The sound of instructor´s voice  is incredibly low while the intro music is high. Really dissapointed with this course.
